models.title: Image Classification
models.description: Model for image recognition and classification. Insert an image to get a prediction and a probability of accuracy.

models.title: Super Resolution
models.description: Insert a low resolution image to get a higher resolution version of that same image. Warning, needs more training to generalize. Takes small (~72px) images only.

models.title: Neural Style Transfer
models.description: Modify an image to be udnie styled

models.title: Neural Style Transfer
models.description: Modify an image to be starry night styled

models.title: Depth Map Prediction from sparse labels
models.description: Predict a depth map from an image. Warning, only works on indoor scenes.

models.title: Depth Map Prediction from sparse labels
models.description: Predict a depth map from an image. Warning, only works on indoor scenes.

models.title: Sentence Classification
models.description: Predicts the nature of a sentence.
